name: radioactivity_concentration_of_250Cf_in_air
description: "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Radioactivity concentration" means radioactivity per unit volume of the medium. "Cf" means the element "californium" and "250Cf" is the isotope "californium-250" with a half-life of 4.75e+03 days.
